# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm extending this opportunity to purchase it for $175. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features that make this product stand out. I'm confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $175. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $175
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
